                                     int amount,
                                     double totalCost)
        Description: Log customer information to the filename including the payment information. From Fernando.
        Parameters:
        currentCustomer - Holds the current customer logged in
        tempEvent - Holds the event chosen by the customer
        amount - Holds the amount the customer from 1-6 gave to the system
        totalCost - Holds the total Cost including any discounts and taxes
